item.description: After breakfast, carpool 3 Mile Rd, then Goose Pond Rd. Hike over N Peak past shelter to S Peak w/view E->S. Descend to 3 Mile Rd. Plan 6 hrs hike + drive time. Gear: per dayhikes www.hikesafe.com, leader may refuse persons w/ inadequate gear. Assume rain and wind no matter the forecast. BYO lunch, at least 2 q H20. Please, no blue jeans.

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: Hike AT Moose Mtn N>S 5.5 miles, +1500' elv. gain
